reviews.review: 이만천원 이라고 하기엔 약간 아까울 법한 게임이지만 할인을 많이 하기에 만 오백원이면 뽕을 다 뽑을 수 있고, 팔천사백원이면 그냥 개꿀이다. But,,,,, 이 게임이 버그갓겜이라는 걸 알고 시작해야만 덜 빡칠 것이다. ^^

Very fun. The level of difficulty for the match really depends on how good the killer is. And I do not believe they match you by your ranking. So it is sink or swim. The game lobbies aren't toxic. It's a fun time!! I like that they are always adding new killers and survivors to keep it fun!

never working, the game always crash. says that i have played for 6h and something, but i really played for 3 games. more than 20$ for a game that i cant even play. THANK DBD for being all about streaming and streamers but never do nothing for the regular gamers. i see that your thing is all about the money and the publicity that you can have.

Really fun game! until it isn't... Game is surrounded by bugs and issues plus dealing with some questionable teammates is really frustrating and some killers players can be a little bit annoying with the way they play the game or their respective play-style. 

That being said, the game can be really satisfying to play and learn, outplaying other players gives off a really satisfying sensation, the game offers a lot of replay-ability, has a high skill ceiling and also this is pretty much the "Super Smash Bros" of horror, since it has so many iconic killers from different movies and game franchises. Overall I recommend this game since there really isn't any other game like this out there, very unique multiplayer game and is relatively cheap, especially on sale. 

I highly recommend you try this game with friends since that's where the game really shines by how much fun you can really have.

Great game so much to do. And a really good idea for a game. It updates are amazing with new characters and story. Lots of cosmetics. Theres also stuff to make your character better and stronger. Takes a lot of skill so its not pay to win. Different sides as killer or survivor i love playing both mostly killer tho. Its worth buying. I would get it if you can buy it. Warning for elite gamers.

The biggest problem I have in the game is that the survivors verbally abused me at the end of the game, as a killer, this saddens me and I quit the game because my psychology did not remove it, they should turn off this chat feature. It really gives people a greater stress than the game, they go without making a sound when they hang 4/4 in the game, and when they run away, they make fun of my killer self-confidence and offend the game. WHAT WE Cried !!! but you might not really believe it I saw killer rank 4.
Very addicting and even better when playing with a party :D recommended 100%%

This game is fun. There isn't really any terror or scary element to it but the excitement from breaking a chase or catching a survivor is very satisfying. I don't understand how the ranks, levels and matchmaking system work so a couple matches can be lopsided. Overall though, I would recommend it.

Nicht empfehlenswert wnen man Spaß haben möchte. Wenn man killer spielt spawnen 350 Quadrillionen Paletten. Die Devs haben mal gesagt (offensichtlich gelogen) dass es eine Maximalzal von Paletten gibt, und dass Paletteneine gewisse Entfernung voneinander haben. Beides stimmt nicht, immer wenn ich Killer spiele spawnt an jedem möglichen Spot eine Palette. Als Survivor ist das nie so. Nur wenn ich Killer bin, deshalb fuckt mich das Drecksspiel ab
very fun with friends, and can actaully be pretty scary lol. But still you should play this.

oyunun mekaniği ve oynanış mantığı güzel.aksiyon ve korku kategorisinde en iyi oyunlardan biri.kötü yanları ise şöyle: Oyun buglarla dolu bazısı eğlenceli olsa bile çoğu can sıkıcı ve oyun deneyiminizi etkiliyor.Bazı oyuncular (ırkçılık yapmak istemem ama ruslar) hile kullanıyor , lag switch yapıyor veya oyuna normal bir şekilde katılmıyorlar.Arkadaşınız yoksa hayatta kalan oynamanızı önermem çünkü büyük bir kordinasyon eksikliği var; Oyunu heyecanlı kılan bi bakıma da bu eksiklik olsa bile arkadaşlarla oynamak daha çok zevk veriyor.
